title: Joe Innes
summary: I build teams who create excellent tech support experiences for enterprise customers.
body: I'm a confident and capable leader with strong technical knowledge, dedicated to achieving remarkable results by making sure that every member of my team has what they need to be successful. My colleagues know me for delivering on commitments and doing whatever I can to help build value collaboratively. My curiosity and ambition drive me to constantly look beyond the status quo for opportunities to innovate or improve.
